prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a spider and has vibrant yellow and blue colors.
I want a Pokemon that can zap its foes with electricity while looking like an agile arachnid.
Generate an electric bug-type creature with distinctive long legs and a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon inspired by a web-slinging insect with striking color patterns and unique features.
Imagine a spider-like Pokemon that thrives in forests, showcasing a mix of yellow and blue hues.
Design an electric-type Pokemon that embodies agility and speed, perfect for quick attacks.
Show me an insectoid Pokemon that captures the essence of both bug and electric types.
